categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Sian Tevv was a male member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic with known ties to the planet Sullust. Shortly before the siege of Inyusu Tor during the Galactic Civil War, Tevv's name was given along with Nien Nunb's and Corjentain Malaqua's as potential Rebel infiltrators that Imperial forces in the city of Pinyumb should look out for, as it was suspected that they might be smuggling arms and equipment to other dissidents.

At some point before the Battle of Endor Tevv became a councillor. Following the battle, the Alliance came to Sullust and after months of fighting, they liberated the planet from Imperial rule. After the liberation, Tevv was escorted into the government center by Mon Mothma and Admiral Gial Ackbar for his ceremonial inauguration.

Sian Tevv was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends Heir to the Empire Sourcebook, which was written by Bill Slavicsek and released in 1992 by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The character was confirmed to be canon when Tevv was mentioned in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, which was written by Alexander Freed and released in 2015.
